text: Territoire de Belfort's 2nd constituency () is a constituency of France. It is one of two constituencies in the department of Territoire de Belfort. It is the least populated constituency in France. ==Election results== |- | colspan="8" bgcolor="#E9E9E9"| |- ==References== Category:French legislative constituencies Category:Territoire de Belfort
title: Territoire de Belfort's 2nd constituency
